problem.multiplechoiceresponse:
Examine the following scenario.
On a visit to the Kingdom of Ogg on the Isle of Grog, all ten adults observed at dinner drank coffee with their meal. The conclusion drawn is that all adult Oggians drink coffee with dinner.
Does the addition of the item below strengthen the argument (S), weaken the argument (W), or leave the strength of the argument unchanged (U)?
The ten adults were observed over a period of seven days.
Strengthen the argument
Weaken the argument
Unchanged
